SELECT j.*, GROUP_CONCAT(IFNULL(c.cert_nm, '없음') SEPARATOR '/ ') AS certNm, CASE WHEN jb.member_id = #{memberId} THEN true ELSE false END AS isBookmark FROM jobs j LEFT JOIN job_cert_map jcm ON j.job_cd = jcm.job_cd LEFT JOIN cert c ON jcm.cert_id = c.cert_id LEFT JOIN jobs_bookmarks jb ON jb.job_cd = j.job_cd
AND j.job_smcl_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{findText}, '%')
AND jb.member_id = #{memberId}
GROUP BY j.job_cd
ORDER BY COUNT(jb.member_id) DESC
ORDER BY jb.bookmarked_at DESC
ORDER BY ((LENGTH(j.job_smcl_nm) - LENGTH(REPLACE(j.job_smcl_nm, #{findText}, ''))) / CHAR_LENGTH(#{findText})) DESC, ((LENGTH(j.job_mdcl_nm) - LENGTH(REPLACE(j.job_mdcl_nm, #{findText}, ''))) / CHAR_LENGTH(#{findText})) DESC, ((LENGTH(j.job_lrcl_nm) - LENGTH(REPLACE(j.job_lrcl_nm, #{findText}, ''))) / CHAR_LENGTH(#{findText})) DESC, ((LENGTH(j.way) - LENGTH(REPLACE(j.way, #{findText}, ''))) / CHAR_LENGTH(#{findText})) DESC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT j.*, COUNT(jb.job_cd) AS bookmarkCount FROM jobs j LEFT JOIN jobs_bookmarks jb ON jb.job_cd = j.job_cd AND jb.bookmarked_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 15 DAY) AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 15 DAY) GROUP BY j.job_cd ORDER BY bookmarkCount DESC, j.job_cd ASC LIMIT 9

SELECT j.*, GROUP_CONCAT(c.cert_nm SEPARATOR '/ ') AS certNm, GROUP_CONCAT(m.major_nm SEPARATOR '/ ') AS majorNm FROM jobs j LEFT JOIN job_cert_map jcm ON j.job_cd = jcm.job_cd LEFT JOIN cert c ON jcm.cert_id = c.cert_id LEFT JOIN job_major_map jmm ON j.job_cd = jmm.job_cd LEFT JOIN major m ON jmm.major_id = m.major_id WHERE j.job_cd = #{jobCd} GROUP BY j.job_cd
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jobs_bookmarks ( member_id, job_cd, bookmarked_at ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{jobCd}, NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM jobs_bookmarks WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND job_cd = #{jobCd}
